text: @StephenCurry30 @NIAIDNews I don't think the coronavirus numbers are going to be anywhere near being controlled when Trump wants to kick start the economy in Easter. What key data will Dr Fauci look at to advise Trump his idea is doomed for failure and risks infecting millions of people? #SCASKSFAUCI

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
